title: Are there any special requirements for charging my Talkband B1 or the charger?
answer: HuaweiTalkBand does not have special requirements on its charger. Common mobile phoneUSB chargers can charge your B1, which are compatible with a vehicle-mountedUSB port and a portable power bank USB port. The charging voltage and currentcan be 5 V/1 A, 5 V/1.5 A, 5 V/2 A, and 5 V/500 mA.
